name: Zalaxia (DEMO)
description:
Long ago, far in the galaxy, exists the planet Zalaxia. A peaceful planet with a terrible problem. Their main power source is dying.
But fear not! The brave Captain Oberon volunteers to search for a solution.

Will he succeed? What will he find?
The answer lies deep within...

Hey everyone!
This is just a little demo for a minigame I'm putting into the "Underway 2" final update. The full minigame will have at least three levels, different obstacles,  real discoveries, and more! But don't forget- this is only a small part of a bigger story...

Credits:
Imagery-Matt McGreevy, DeepFold, Dakota Lyons
Music, Coding, Creation-Matt McGreevy
